did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.abstract: The collection consists of a Blickensderfer 6, a portable typewriter produced by the Blickensderfer Manufacturing Company in 1906, with its original carrying case.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Blickensderfer Manufacturing Company was founded by George C. Blickensderfer (1850-1917) in Stamford, Connecticut, in 1889 to manufacture portable typewriters.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a Blickensderfer 6, a portable typewriter produced by the Blickensderfer Manufacturing Company in 1906, with its original carrying case.
